title: 07/21/21 DPS Hour 1 Tim Legler
itunes:title: 07/21/21 DPS Hour 1 Tim Legler
description:
Tim Legler talks to Dan about the NBA Finals. Tim says that Giannis' performance last night was the best he has ever seen.
